name: BITBUCKET__REPOSITORIES
description: List repositories for a workspace with filtering and pagination options.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_REPOSITORY
description: Get detailed information about a specific repository.

name: BITBUCKET__CREATE_REPOSITORY
description: Create a new repository in a workspace with specified configuration.

name: BITBUCKET__UPDATE_REPOSITORY
description: Update repository settings and configuration.

name: BITBUCKET__DELETE_REPOSITORY
description: Delete a repository permanently from the workspace.

name: BITBUCKET__PULL_REQUESTS
description: List pull requests for a repository with filtering and state options.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_PULL_REQUEST
description: Get detailed information about a specific pull request.

name: BITBUCKET__CREATE_PULL_REQUEST
description: Create a new pull request with source and destination branches.

name: BITBUCKET__UPDATE_PULL_REQUEST
description: Update pull request title, description, or reviewers.

name: BITBUCKET__MERGE_PULL_REQUEST
description: Merge a pull request into the destination branch.

name: BITBUCKET__DECLINE_PULL_REQUEST
description: Decline a pull request without merging it.

name: BITBUCKET__BRANCHES
description: List all branches in a repository with filtering and sorting options.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_BRANCH
description: Get detailed information about a specific branch.

name: BITBUCKET__CREATE_BRANCH
description: Create a new branch from an existing commit or branch.

name: BITBUCKET__DELETE_BRANCH
description: Delete a branch from the repository.

name: BITBUCKET__COMMITS
description: List commits in a repository with filtering and pagination.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_COMMIT
description: Get detailed information about a specific commit.

name: BITBUCKET__ISSUES
description: List issues in a repository with filtering and sorting options.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_ISSUE
description: Get detailed information about a specific issue.

name: BITBUCKET__CREATE_ISSUE
description: Create a new issue in the repository with title, description, and metadata.

name: BITBUCKET__UPDATE_ISSUE
description: Update an existing issue's title, description, or metadata.

name: BITBUCKET__DELETE_ISSUE
description: Delete an issue from the repository.

name: BITBUCKET__WEBHOOKS
description: List all webhooks configured for the repository.

name: BITBUCKET__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a new webhook for the repository to receive event notifications.

events.description: Event types to trigger webhook (e.g., repo:push, pullrequest:created)

name: BITBUCKET__DELETE_WEBHOOK
description: Delete a webhook from the repository.

name: BITBUCKET__PIPELINES
description: List CI/CD pipelines for the repository with filtering options.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_PIPELINE
description: Get detailed information about a specific pipeline execution.

name: BITBUCKET__TRIGGER_PIPELINE
description: Trigger a new pipeline execution for a specific branch or commit.

ref_name.description: Name of branch, tag, or bookmark

name: BITBUCKET__GET_USER
description: Get information about a Bitbucket user by username.

name: BITBUCKET__GET_WORKSPACE
description: Get information about a workspace by slug.

name: BITBUCKET__WORKSPACES
description: List all workspaces the authenticated user has access to.
